verses.verse: The angel<WH4397> who talked<WH1696> with me came again,<WH7725> and wakened<WH5782> me,<WH376> as a man who is wakened<WH5782> out of his sleep.<WH8142>

He said<WH559> to me,<WH7200> "What do you see?" I said,<WH559> "I have seen,<WH7200> and behold,<WH4501> a lampstand all of gold,<WH2091> with its bowl<WH1531> on the top<WH7218> of it,<WH7651> and its seven lamps<WH5216> thereon;<WH7651> there are seven pipes<WH4166> to each of the<WH7651> lamps,<WH5216> which are on the top of it;<WH7218>
and two<WH8147> olive trees<WH2132> by it,<WH259> one on the right<WH3225> side of the bowl,<WH1543> and the other<WH259> on the left side of it.<WH8040>"
I answered<WH6030> and spoke<WH559> to the angel<WH4397> who talked<WH1696> with me,<WH559> saying, "What are these,<WH113> my lord?"
Then the angel<WH4397> who talked<WH1696> with me answered<WH6030> me,<WH3045> "Don't you know what these are?<WH559>" I said, "No,<WH113> my lord."

Then he answered<WH6030> and spoke<WH559> to me,<WH559> saying, "This is the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> to Zerubbabel,<WH2216> saying,<WH559> <WH2428> 'Not by might, nor by power,<WH3581> but by my Spirit,<WH7307>' says<WH559> Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies.<WH6635>

Who are you,<WH1419> great mountain?<WH2022> Before<WH6440> Zerubbabel<WH2216> you are a plain;<WH4334> and he will bring out<WH3318> the capstone<WH68> with shouts of<WH2580> 'Grace, grace,<WH2580> to it!'"
Moreover the word<WH1697> of Yahweh<WH3068> came to me,<WH559> saying,

"The hands<WH3027> of Zerubbabel<WH2216> have laid the foundation<WH3245> of this house.<WH1004> His hands<WH3027> shall also finish<WH1214> it;<WH3045> and you will know that Yahweh<WH3068> of Armies<WH6635> has sent me to you.<WH7971>

Indeed,<WH936> who despises the day<WH3117> of small things?<WH6996> For these seven shall rejoice,<WH8055> and shall see<WH7200> the plumb<WH68> line in the hand<WH3027> of Zerubbabel.<WH2216> These<WH7651> are the eyes<WH5869> of Yahweh,<WH3068> which run back and forth<WH7751> through the whole earth.<WH776>"
Then I asked<WH559> him,<WH8147> "What are these two olive trees<WH2132> on the right<WH3225> side of the lampstand<WH4501> and on the left side of it?<WH8040>"

I asked<WH559> him the second<WH8145> time,<WH8147> "What are these two olive<WH2132> branches,<WH7641> which are beside<WH3027> the two<WH8147> golden<WH2091> spouts,<WH6804> that pour<WH7324> the golden oil out of themselves?<WH2091>"
He answered<WH559> me,<WH3045> "Don't you know what these are?<WH559>" I said, "No,<WH113> my lord."
Then he said,<WH559> "These are the two<WH8147> anointed<WH3323> ones<WH1121> who stand<WH5975> by the Lord<WH113> of the whole earth.<WH776>"
